verbose_text: The characteristic reduction in bodyweight gain following MNX was suppressed in response to clenbuterol pre-treatment, leading to similar weight gain to those animals undergoing the sham control procedure (clenbuterol MNX : 20.16 +/- 1.11%, sham control 24.03 +/- 0.98%).
evidence: MNX was suppressed in response to clenbuterol pre-treatment, leading to similar weight gain
